title: Chocolate New York pie
description: Layers of rich chocolate filling and homemade jam is topped with shards of praline for extra crunch. For this recipe you will need a 25cm/10in fluted tart tin, a sugar thermometer and a food processor.
ingredients: 100g/3½oz icing sugar (golden icing sugar if available)
150g/5½oz unsalted butter, chilled, plus extra for greasing
1 medium free-range egg, for egg wash
